  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    AggressiveStrategy
    Represents aggressive strategy in which computer player focuses on attack.
    ArmyType
    enum for army types: Infantry, Cavalry, Artillery.
    AttackTest
    The Class AttackTest.
    BeanTestSuite
    The Class BeanTestSuite.
    BenevolentStrategy
    The Class BenevolentStrategy.
    CardExchangeTest
    This class tests the Card Exchange methods.
    CardExchangeView
    The Class CardExchangeView.
    CardSet
    enum for card sets, representing different sets of 3 RISK cards.
    CardType
    enum for card types: Infantry, Cavalry, and Artillery.
    CheaterStrategy
    Implementation of Cheater Strategy A cheater computer player strategy whose reinforce() method doubles the number of armies on all its countries, whose attack() method automatically conquers all the neighbors of all its countries, and whose fortify() method doubles the number of armies on its countries that have neighbors that belong to other players.
    Config
    This class is used to configure the project.
    ConfigTest
    The Class ConfigTest.
    ConfigTestSuite
    The Class ConfigTestSuite.
    Continent
    The Class Continent represents a continent in the map.
    ContinentTest
    The Class ContinentTest.
    ControllerTest
    The Class ControllerTest.
    Country
    The Class Country.
    CountryTest
    The Class CountryTest.
    CustomMapGenerator
    This class is responsible for loading a map,creating a new map or editing an existing map.
    DiceRoller
    This class is used to create a single-ton object that is used to generate a random number between range 1 to 6.
    DiceRollerTest
    The Class DiceRollerTest.
    EditMap Deprecated.
    This class is no longer used.
    EditMapTest
    The Class EditMapTest.
    EventType
    This class is used for naming the events that raise the notifyEach() method.
    FortificationTest
    The Class FortificationTest.
    GameController
    The Class GameController.
    GameStat
    This class is used to save or load the status of the game.
    GUITest  
    Human
    Represents human strategy, user inputs are required for all phases.
    MapController
    This class is responsible for handling creation and deletion of countries and continents.
    MapFileWriter
    This class writes into the existing input map and update it accordingly.
    MapInvalidException
    This class is used to handle Invalid Map Exceptions.
    MapParser
    This class is used to handle the parsing of map files.
    MapParserTest
    The Class MapParserTest.
    MapTest
    The Class MapTest.
    MapUpdateTest
    This class test the updates made in the existing map file.
    MapValidator
    This class creates the main graph of countries and subgraphs of continents.
    MapValidatorTest
    This class test for MapValidator class.
    Observable
    interface for observable subjects to implements.

    The Interface Observer.
    Phase
    The Enum Phase.

    The Class PhaseTestSuite.
    PhaseView
    Implementation of a phase view using the Observer pattern.
    Player
    This class stores the players details.
    PlayerTest
    The Class PlayerTest.
    RandomStrategy
    Implementation of Random Strategy A random computer player strategy that reinforces random a random country, attacks a random number of times a random country, and fortifies a random country, all following the standard rules for each phase.
    ReEnforcementTest
    The Class ReEnforcementTest.
    ReplicateMap
    This class is used to clone the original map so that the original map is not affected by the changes made by user.
    Strategy
    Represent a game play strategy, different strategies have different implementation reEnforcement, Attack and Fortification .
    TestSerialization
    The Class TestSerialization.
    TestSuite
    The Class TestSuite.
    Tuple
    This class is a container to stores info needed for army distribution in ReEnforcement phase.
    UI
    The user interface of the application.
    UtilTestSuite
    The Class UtilTestSuite.
    WorldDominationView
    The WorldDominationView class is used to get the progress of the game.
